results.name: Triangle read by rows, matrix triple product A000012 * A145677 * A000012.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A000012 * A145677 * A000012; where A000012 = an infinite lower triangular matrix: (1; 1,1; 1,1,1;...), with all 1's.
